title: WCAS SPANISH 121-2-42 Intermediate Spanish
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

One Addtl hour or more TBA

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Communicative method. Further development of grammar, vocabulary, speaking, and writing skills through readings in modern prose. Three class meetings a week. Outside online video lab twice a week.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: 121-1 or departmental Spanish Language Placement Exam

subject: SPANISH
